title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo – get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, stream, create models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer; use Ollama models for chat, tools, retrieval and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Android compatible.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience CLI wrapper around Ollama with interactive chat and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with your documents.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions via Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that streams Ollama chat responses into channels/threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on your notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Pure Nim client for Ollama REST API with async support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed sync/async clients for Ollama.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with C# and F# examples; supports streaming chat.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models via REST and WebSocket chat endpoints.

title: ollama-rag-langchain
summary: End-to-end RAG template combining LangChain, Ollama and Streamlit to chat with PDFs.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chat UI for Ollama with Markdown rendering and code highlighting.
